channel.title: Migrate your application to Liteflow
channel.description:
With the launch of Liteflow[https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wrYhWFQ18qvmD3fMmucan0bg4l8HlCkoIuTcWw0_H1A/edit], the current ecosystem of MESG has changed, and your application is slightly different, but that’s for the best.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/p/5524418a-ced9-4361-9a86-0cc5b0b4308e/

item.title: Migrate your application to Liteflow
